page.title: 04ATTITUDES
page.content: The main attitudes in our area are as follows.The results were obtained using the following survey. 1.Do you agree with expansion of Stansted Airport?{60%}disagree,{20% agree,{20%}do not know. 2.Do you think village transport is satisfactory?{80%}no,{20%}yes. 3.Do you think the village has changed a lot over the last 10-15 years? {98%}yes,{2%}no. 4.Do you think that late night Youth Clubs are a good idea?{70%}yes{ {30% }no. 5.Do you think Nuclear power stations are viable alternatives?{75%} no,{25%}yes. 6.Do you have a pet?{89%}yes,{11%}no
